title: Blue Devil Suite
description: House of ShadowsWhen Peggy Cameron was sent by her rich boss to bid for the old Federal Hotel, she had no idea the place was haunted--or that she would become the victim of two attacks. Peggy discovered a handsome neighbor, a mysterious grave, and a fiendish plot. Some one would do anything to keep Peggy from the secret of Blue Devil Suite.
author: Dorothy Daniels
